title: Brewery Finder
description: An app that lets the user search for breweries by state. It utilizes the Open Brewery DB, Yelp, and Google Maps APIs.

title: Code Quiz
description: A javascript powered quiz that tests the user's knowledge of the language. The users can also post their high score.

title: Day Planner
description: A simple JQuery powered calendar app to help schedule a work day. Events save and can be accessed when revisiting the site.

title: Pizza Party
description: This app presents the user with a pizza party! Make a new pizza and then devour it. Powered by MySQL and Handlebars.

title: Employee Tracker
description: This app helps busines owners keep track of their current employee directory. Add to the directory using Node and MySQL.

title: Furry Friend Finder
description: A full stack app that allows the user to search for adoptable pets in their area, and keep organized in the process by saving favorites.
